title: Summer Afternoon
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Riko-chan, I brought you barley tea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, sorry! I was lost in my book...... Sitting here and reading on the porch makes it really easy to focus.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Don’t the whining of the cicadas annoy you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Huh? Now that you mention that, it was really easy to tune them out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ahaha, that’s good then, zura. Sitting on this porch and reading is nice, but taking a nap here also feels great~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s nice and breezy here. Hey, why don’t we take a short nap right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then, Maru will bring over a blanket. You don’t want to get a cold, Riko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. Okay~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
